metadata.name: Organic Egg Kefali, selfportrait performance
metadata.description:
Size: 8000 x 8000 px / 400 DPI

Artist statement:

Kefali series, is a research of Contemporary Archaeology, a study of unusual behaviors of groups of humans and animals, either by artistic practices, atmospheric phenomena or changes in the habitat of animals.

The word Kefali means, head in Greek.
Sometimes I use words in Greek, because they were the first anthropologists to study the human being and his environment.

Various artistic techniques were used in this project, performance, self-portrait, digital x-ray photography, multimedia and manipulation.

On an exploratory journey, the past seduces the present time.

Ariadna Canaan
